name: SOLD OUT - Custom 15" MinhaBoneca Doll
description:
This listing is for a complete custom 15" MinhaBoneca Doll. Doll will be completed within 6 weeks of finalizing details.

Custom Doll Includes:
Choice of Skin Color (Golden, Light Golden, Fair, Skin, Mocha)
Choice of Eye Color
Choice of Color and Yarn Fiber (up to a combination of 3 different yarns)
Choice of Hair Length

Custom Doll includes a complete doll outfit including shoes and underpants.

Note: Custom to be completed within 6 weeks of finalizing custom details.

name: Custom Infant Lovie
description:
This listing is for a Custom Personalized Infant Lovie. 
Please allow three weeks for your custom Lovie to be completed. 

This little doll is the perfect comfort toy for your infant. Lovingly hand-made with soft velour fabric and stuffed with wool. Wool naturally absorbs scents like Home, Mommy and Daddy. If you snuggle with your Lovie before giving it to your baby, it will naturally absorb your scent. This can be extremely comforting to an infant.

Care Instructions:
To spot clean, use a soft cloth, mild wool friendly soap and cool water. Rub with the grain of the fabric. It can also be put into the washer on the gentle cycle. Always lay flat to dry.

name: Lauren - 15" MinhaBoneca Jointed Baby
description:
Meet Lauren! She is a 15" MinhaBoneca Jointed Baby made with all natural materials.

She has golden colored skin, dark blue/navy eyes, and a gorgeous mix of mohair yarn for hair. 

She is wearing a cotton/velour sleeper and a removable fleece diaper. 

Lauren is hand made out of all natural materials, high quality anti-pill interlock for skin and stuffed well with clean carded wool.

The baby doll's arms and legs are attached using teddy bear joints, and are reinforced inside the doll's body. These dolls measure approximately 15″ in height. 

Ages 3+

*Shipping cost includes Priority shipping, insurance, and tracking.

*International shipping cost includes Express shipping, insurance, and tracking.

name: SOLD OUT Custom - Personalized Infant Lovie
description: This listing is for a Custom Personalized Infant Lovie. This little doll is the perfect comfort toy for your infant. Lovingly hand-made with soft velour fabric and stuffed with wool. Wool naturally absorbs scents like Home, Mommy and Daddy. If you snuggle with your Lovie before giving it to your baby, it will naturally absorb your scent. This can be extremely comforting to an infant. The personalized teething ring is made of all natural organic maple wood finished with beeswax and olive oil. Your baby's name will be meticulously wood-burned into the ring in cursive using a wood-burning dot technique and will create a 100% unique and one of a kind teething ring. Teething rings are created by Indie Bambino. Visit Indie Bambino on Etsy Please allow two weeks for your custom Lovie to be completed. Note: Price listed is for one name. An additional name can be added for $3. Care Instructions: To spot clean, use a soft cloth, mild wool friendly soap and cool water. Rub with the grain of the fabric. It can also be put into the washer on the gentle cycle. Always lay flat to dry.
